title: Bluetooth not work with Car kit Land Rover
content:
Carkit bluetooth disconnetion cause due PBAP profile.

The pairing works fine with all AVRCP profile (1.3 to 1.6)

Music and calls works fine except when the carkit try to sync the contact list and/or call list. 

During this event (casul interrupt) the bluetooth of the car switches off and on again and if you are calling the mobile phone switch audio to telephone for 5/10 seconds until bluetooth reconnects or if you are lisening spotify the car audio switches to radio mode.  

I have tried: repairing with all AVRCP profile, mobile hard reset, safety mod but nothing.

With Android 10 I fix the problem with thried party application "Phonebook Bluetooth of andorid-rsap.com Martin Gerczuk", that fix the PBAP incompatibility from Google Pixel and carkit.

With Android 11 "Phonebook Bluetooth app" crash when the bluetooth of the mobile phone switch on. I tried to change all permission but nothing.

With the iPhone Xs, iPhone 6 and with Huawei Android 8  all work great, so the problem is software.

Please solve it
